questions.question: Which option shows that something is probably true now?
options: He must to be at home.

questions.question: Complete the sentence: 'She _____ have left her phone at the restaurant.'
Which sentence expresses a possibility in the future?
options: I might travel to London next year.
I must travel to London next year.
I traveled to London last year.
I will travel to London for sure.
questions.answer: I might travel to London next year.
